content: update i changed my name on isntagram it s now @maudknitwear hello everyone this is my first pattern ever this is a dragonfly headband you will have 4 dragonflies total all of them facing the top it is beginner friendly in the pattern you will have an entier page explaining how to do a stacked single_crochet at the beginning of each row and how to do decrease and increase with it i only used 15-20 grams of yarn so it s a great scrap yarn project i designed it with fingering weight yarn so if you have scraps from making socks it s perfect it s a really quick project i take less than an hour to make it you can contact me on ravelry or instagram @maudknitwear if you have any questions about the pattern english is not my first language so i m sorry if there are mistakes
